melodic.translation[0].definitions[0].de: something that sounds melodic sounds like music or has a pleasant tune
melodic.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Their music is loud and not very melodic.
melodic.translation[0].definitions[1].de: concerned with the main tune in a piece of music
melodic.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: There is very little melodic variation in the piece.
